column5: Went up to the grand today.My two buddies caught 3 walleye all around 16 inches and two oos bass.All released all i got was a rock bass also released lol.
Nice work. Upper Grand, Lower Grand?  Good to see some practicing catch and release. I can't say I'd do the same, too hard to resist fresh walleye. lol

My guess is because it is listed as the third worst polluted river in Ontario.. would you eat you're catch from the Don? (which ranked 1st) Might not be as bad in Dunville because of Erie..  But Guelph and alot other cities along the grand pump their sewage into the river... and given the watershed's size it explains why it is listed as one of the dirtiest rivers in Ontario.  G...
Thanks for the report. No pictures??
Uh oh!  Let's not get into this again Gerritt
Bwhahahahaa! I speak nothing but truth..  G...
ya sorry no pics forgot the camera.
